Package components

Class StandardTruck

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
components.Truck
components.StandardTruck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Node, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Runnable
public class StandardTruck
extends Truck
Represents a vehicle that used for delivering small packages and standard packages
  • Transfer many packages per trip.
  • Collects only SmallPackage and StandardPackage.
  • Got a weight limit.
Version:
3.0, 14/6/2021
Author:
Itzik Rahamim - 312202351, Gil Ben Hamo - 315744557
See Also:
Truck

    • StandardTruck

      public StandardTruck​(java.lang.String licensePlate, java.lang.String truckModel, int maxWeight)
      Constructs and initializes a StandardTruck by values
      Example: StandardTruck("123-45-678", "M3", 500)
      Parameters:
      licensePlate - Vehicle ID number
      truckModel - Vehicle model
      maxWeight - Maximum weight that the truck can carry

  • Method Details

    • work

      public void work()
      Performs work according to the purpose of the trip
      • If the vehicle is on its way, the clock shortens by a second
      • When time left to arrive is 0 do the job according to the purpose of the trip:

      Options:
      • Deliver the packages to the HUB.
      • Deliver the packages to their branch, and collect packages to deliver to HUB
      • Trip ends when arriving at HUB
